5 // <summary>
6 // BasePage for all pages to inherit from and gain basic function
7 // </summary>
8 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
9 namespace Fasetto.Word
10 {
11  using Fasetto.Word.Core;
12  using System.Threading.Tasks;
13  using System.Windows;
14  using System.Windows.Controls;
15 
16  /// <inheritdoc/>
17  /// <summary>
18  /// BasePage for all pages to inherit from and gain basic functionality
19  /// </summary>
20  public class BasePage : Page
21  {
22  #region Public Constructors
23 
24  /// <inheritdoc/>
25  /// <summary>
26  /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Fasetto.Word.BasePage"/> class.
27  /// </summary>
28  public BasePage()
29  {
30  // If we are animating, hide the animation, for it to load properly
31  if (PageLoadAnimation != PageAnimation.None)
32  {
33  Visibility = Visibility.Collapsed;
34  }
35 
36  // Listen for the PageLoad event and hook into it.
37  Loaded += BasePage_LoadedAsync;
38  }
39 
40  #endregion Public Constructors
41 
42 
43 
44  #region Public Properties
45 
46  /// <summary>
47  /// A flag to indicate if this page should animate out on load. Useful for when we are moving
48  /// the page to another frame
49  /// </summary>
50  public bool AnimateOut { get; set; }
51 
52  /// <summary>
53  /// Gets or sets the page load animation.
54  /// </summary>
55  public PageAnimation PageLoadAnimation { get; set; } = PageAnimation.SlideAndFadeInFromRight;
56 
57  /// <summary>
58  /// Gets or sets the page unload animation.
59  /// </summary>
60  public PageAnimation PageUnloadAnimation { get; set; } = PageAnimation.SlideAndFadeOutToLeft;
61 
62  /// <summary>
63  /// Gets or sets how long the slide animation lasts
64  /// </summary>
65  public float SlideSeconds { get; set; } = 0.4f;
66 
67  #endregion Public Properties
68 
69  #region Animation Load / Unload
70 
71  /// <summary>
72  /// The animation when a page gets loaded
73  /// </summary>
74  /// <param name="sender">The page to be animated</param>
75  /// <param name="e">Any parameters passed</param>
76  private async void BasePage_LoadedAsync(object sender, System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs e)
77  {
78  if (AnimateOut)
79  {
80  await AnimateOutAsync();
81  }
82  else
83  {
84  await AnimateInAsync();
85  }
86  }
87 
88  /// <summary>
89  /// Animate the PageLoad
90  /// </summary>
91  /// <returns>The <see cref="Task"/> result</returns>
92  public async Task AnimateInAsync()
93  {
94  if (PageLoadAnimation == PageAnimation.None)
95  {
96  return;
97  }
98 
99  switch (PageLoadAnimation)
100  {
101  case PageAnimation.SlideAndFadeInFromRight:
102  await this.SlideAndFadeInFromRightAsync(SlideSeconds);
103  break;
104 
105  default:
106  break;
107  }
108  }
109 
110  /// <summary>
111  /// Animate the PageUnload
112  /// </summary>
113  /// <returns>The <see cref="Task"/> result</returns>
114  public async Task AnimateOutAsync()
115  {
116  if (PageLoadAnimation == PageAnimation.None)
117  {
118  return;
119  }
120 
121  switch (PageUnloadAnimation)
122  {
123  case PageAnimation.SlideAndFadeOutToLeft:
124  await this.SlideAndFadeOutToLeftAsync(SlideSeconds);
125  break;
126 
127  default:
128  break;
129  }
130  }
131 
132  #endregion Animation Load / Unload
133  }
134 
135  /// <inheritdoc/>
136  /// <summary>
137  /// A base page with added ViewModel support
138  /// </summary>
139  /// <typeparam name="VM">The mViewModel Type</typeparam>
140  public class BasePage<VM> : BasePage
141  where VM : BaseViewModel, new()
142 
143  {
144  #region Constructor
145 
146  /// <inheritdoc/>
147  /// <summary>
148  /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Fasetto.Word.BasePage"/> class.
149  /// </summary>
150  public BasePage() : base()
151  {
152  // Create a default view model
153  ViewModel = new VM();
154  }
155 
156  #endregion Constructor
157 
158 
159 
160  #region Public Properties
161 
162  /// <summary>
163  /// Gets or sets the view model for this page.
164  /// </summary>
165  public VM ViewModel
166  {
167  get => mViewModel;
168 
169  set
170  {
171  // if nothing has changed simply return
172  if (mViewModel == value)
173  {
174  return;
175  }
176 
177  // Update the mViewModel
178  mViewModel = value;
179 
180  // Update the DataContext
181  DataContext = mViewModel;
182  }
183  }
184 
185  #endregion Public Properties
186 
187  #region Private members
188 
189  /// <summary>
190  /// The mViewModel associated with this page
191  /// </summary>
192  private VM mViewModel { get; set; }
193 
194  #endregion Private members
195  }
196 }
